paragraph.heading: 1Favorites tree
paragraph.paragraph: The favorites tree gives a graphical representation of the favorite classes of the system, as opposed to the favoritesmenu.

In this tree, the folders are user-definable through the
30_organize_favorites_dialog/00_introduction.xml Organize Favorites dialog . They have no other goal than ordering the favorites. In particular, they are entirely independent from the clusters of the system.

Clicking a class in the favorites tree edits it. Keyboard navigation is also available. Favorite classes are
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/05_general_interface_description/10_general_interface_mechanisms/10_pick_and_drop.xml pickable too, so that it is possible to send them to all interface components that accept classes.
